title: CryptoPhysicist
author: CryptoPhysicist
content: Hello, it's Jaakko from CryptoPhysicist here. I have been reviewing crypto casinos since 2015 with my old review site until in 2020 I decided to sell the site away. I have been away from crypto casinos until now when I founded my new site in August 2023.https://cryptophysicist.com/The site is still fairly new, so only one review has been published so far, Bspin.io: https://cryptophysicist.com/reviews/bspin-io/Please give feedback of the review to me here or to my mail: jaakko@cryptophysicist.comI would be happy to read your experiences about Bspin.io also here. I would like to add them to my review also if you have any experiences, good or bad. To keep the user reviews trustworthy, I will probably weigh experienced Bitcointalk accounts more and first add them to the review.Why I am back and how CryptoPhysicist is different from all other review sites?The internet is full of review websites and crypto casinos are no exception. The biggest problem in many review sites is trustworthiness. Almost always, the reviews sites earn affiliate income and it is hard to know if the reviews are independent and unbiased.The temptation to recommend an inferior casino can be too big to resist, especially if the casino is offering you a great affiliate deal in return (trust me, I know this happens a lot).However, my mission on CryptoPhysicist is to stay 100% independent. I will only recommend crypto casinos where I would play myself or would recommend to my friends.I will test, analyze and review all the casinos myself. Everything you see on my site is created and written by me. I don’t even use any designers (which you can probably tell), coders, content writers or translators – it is just me.If I would recommend inferior casinos or write things that are not true, you probably would be disappointed at some point and never come back to my site. So there is no intention for me to recommend casinos I wouldn’t play in myself.My aim in the long term is to create the most useful and trustworthy crypto casino review site out there. So I am not after quick short term affiliate rewards and I am not for sale for the crypto casino owners.To read more about me and the idea behind the site:https://cryptophysicist.com/about/
